title: ECD Connect Data Report
text:
Data report as of 21 October 2025


A summary of ECD Connect’s reach.
This includes the ECD Connect App (open-access), all ECD Connect Partner versions (white-label) and Grow Great’s CHW Connect. The numbers below represent all numbers since launch.



4


partner organisations




2,063


unique user sign-ups




12,422


total number of children added across all platforms





















Since launch in April 2025 to October 2025



1,508


unique sign-ups




509


preschools added




1,522


children registered






17% of users who joined the app over 30 days ago have logged in again after 30 days. This is higher than the standard global app retention rate of 7% by day 30.
10% of practitioners who signed up over 30 days ago have logged in within the past month.





Since launch in October 2024 to October 2025



226


unique sign-ups




61


preschools added




887


children registered






26% of users who joined the app over 30 days ago have logged in again after 30 days.
13% of practitioners who signed up over 30 days ago have logged in within the past month.








Since launch in April 2024 to October 2025



342


CHWs registered




60 160


child visits completed




6 495


pregnant client visits completed






79% of CHWs who joined the app over 30 days ago have logged in again after 30 days.
35% of CHWs who signed up over 30 days ago have logged in within the past month.





























































More graphs to be added







As we roll out to more users, we are seeing an increase in the number of attendance registers saved per month.












With a smaller user base for ECD Connect Partner, attendance tracking has held fairly steady with a few bumps in engagement around in-person training sessions.




























Balance is income minus expenses








Total Preschools
Mean Balance (R)
Median Balance (R)
Minimum Balance (R)
Maximum Balance (R)
Standard Deviation (R)




46
4,535
−374
−58,500
100,980
25,502




















Total income vs expenses per month across all preschools













Percentage breakdown of income and expense categories during the selected period. Each pie shows the share of total income or total expenses contributed by each category.















Among those who logged income and expenses.
